nokey.food package

Submodules

nokey.food.fruityvice module

class nokey.food.fruityvice.Fruityvice[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the Fruityvice API.

Attributes: - base_url: The base url of the Fruityvice API.

get_all_fruit()[source]

Returns all the fruit listed in the Fruityvice API.

Args: - None

Returns: - dict: Dictionary containing all the fruit listed in the API.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns the url for the Fruityvice API documentation.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: URL for API documentation.

get_fruit_by_family(family)[source]

Returns fruit matching the given family.

Args: - family (str): The name of a fruit family.

Returns: -dict: Dictionary containing fruit of the given family.

get_fruit_by_genus(genus)[source]

Returns fruit matching the given genus.

Args: - genus (str): The name of a fruit genus.

Returns: -dict: Dictionary containing fruit of the given genus.

get_fruit_by_nutrition(nutrition, minVal=0, maxVal=1000)[source]

Returns a fruit with its information based on a minimum and maximum range of values for the specified nutritional component.

Args: - nutrition (str): A nutritional component. Possible values are carbohydrates, protein, fat, calories, and sugar. - minVal (float): The minimum value of the range specified for nutritional component (per 100g of the fruit). Defaults to its minimum possible value, which is 0. - maxVal (float): The maximum value of the range specified for nutritional component (per 100g of the fruit). Defaults to its maximum possible value, which is 1000.

Returns: - dict: Dictionary containing information on the fruit matching the specified values.

get_fruit_by_order(order)[source]

Returns fruit matching the given order.

Args: - order (str): The name of a fruit order.

Returns: -dict: Dictionary containing fruit of the given order.
